import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' export const Post = ({ lang, title, path, date, description }) => { console.log(date, typeof date) const options = { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' } const languageClass = lang === 'ar' ? 'u-rightToLeft' : null const localeDate = new Date(JSON.parse(date)).toLocaleDateString( lang === 'ar' ? 'ar-EG' : 'en-US', options ) return (

  • {title}

    {description}

    {localeDate}
    • ) }
